field.name: summary
field.value: Anothe set of misc patches for silverlight

field.name: description
field.value: Dont use useFastCreateInstance in Silverlight No Delegate.Combine(value) in Silverlight No ISupportInitialize in Silverlight No String.Compare(string, string, bool) in Silverlight No Enum.GetNames in Silverlight Cannot load an assembly by file in Silverlight No Type.GetInterface(string) in Silverlight Dont override MarshalByRefObject.InitializeLifetimeService() in Silverlight No Convert.ChangeType(value, Type); in Silverlight Make DefaultConversionManager.slot not readonly Exclude usages of FileResourceFactory in Silverlight

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.
